metadata.title: Creighton's Songs and Ballads from Nova Scotia
metadata.description: Digital edition of Songs and Ballads from Nova Scotia, collected  by Helen Creighton (1932). The ditigal edition was prepared by Craig Stuart Sapp in the Humdrum file format.

issues.title: Language correct?
issues.description: Added language English (Atlantic Provinces English). Is this  indeed correct?

issues.title: Reference record AMD?
issues.description: Some files have a reference record `AMD`. Not sure what this is, but the values indicate its either the scale or modality. Is this correct?

file.rawMarkdownBody:
Catafolk notes
--------------

- All songs have coordinates 45, -63, which is somewhere in Nova Scotia. The low precision indiates that no preciser location is known.
